CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In conclusion , diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) units have successfully been incorporated into a D-A polymer backbone by Suzuki polymerization with 2,7-carbazole comonomer , affording a poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) ( PCDSeBT ) ; This design motif is that replacement of thiophenes to selenophene units in PCDTBT that acts as a superior p - type photoactive material for PSCs , induces a lower bandgap ( 1.70 eV ) than that of PCDTBT ( 1.85 eV ) , while the ideal HOMO energy level ( -5.40 eV ) is still maintained.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| diselenienylbenzothiadiazole (DSeBT) |
| 2,7-carbazole |
| poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) (PCDSeBT) |
| thiophenes |
| selenophene units in PCDTBT |
| PCDTBT |
| p-type photoactive material for PSCs |
| HOMO energy level |

The entities are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After removing the entities that do not clearly refer to "Material Name", we have the following valid entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| diselenienylbenzothiadiazole (DSeBT) |
| 2,7-carbazole |
| poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) (PCDSeBT) |
| selenophene units in PCDTBT |
| PCDTBT |

The entities are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
